amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Department of Justice General Administration Salaries and Expenses account by $1 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Department of Justice General Administration Salaries and Expenses account by $1 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gowdy amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Gowdy.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gowdy amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
